function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Centralized storage of transaction details, calls, and messages","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of gps history and wi-fi information","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open-source code for the application","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on bluetooth technology for proximity tracing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and storage","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misuse of app data by unauthorized parties","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth low energy for contact tracing","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of contact data on the user’s device","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retention of contact data on the central server","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Storage of user location and bluetooth data on a centralized server.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on wi-fi, bluetooth, and gps for contact identification","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on minimum number of satellites for accurate position determination","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on aging satellites with limited lifespan","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for clear visibility of four satellites for accurate point calculation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interference from devices using 2.4 ghz radio frequencies can reduce wi-fi speed or cause loss of internet connection.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of data over radio waves","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical development of wi-fi technology leading to current widespread adoption and usage.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bluetooth technology operates at 2.4 ghz frequency, making it more prone to hackers and privacy interference.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to natural conditions in city living","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of human-centric design in architecture","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Artificial environmental conditions associated with chronic diseases, allergies, and syndromes such as sick building syndrome","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to indoor sedentary lifestyles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on artificial systems for lighting and ventilation","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-density living and overbuilding activity may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases in densely built spaces.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to lack of safety measures in construction sites.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of late or halted deliveries of materials from suppliers, impacting project timelines and progress.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wastewater surveillance to estimate covid-19 presence and prevalence.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in correlating sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater with covid-19 prevalence due to various factors such as excretion differences, environmental variables, and unreported cases.","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in wastewater","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in rt-qpcr n1, n2, and n3 assays for water samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inhibitory effect of the matrix on rna detection in wastewater samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding infectivity of viral particles in sewage and feces","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing method limitations for viral concentration from water samples","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling sars-cov-2 in the laboratory environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of influent and effluent water with mgv and pedv","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-significant differences in virus recovery rates between influent waters","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Significant differences in virus recovery rates between effluent waters","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential contamination of reaction mix due to incorrect handling or storage of reagents.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of outdated or expired reagents in the reaction mix.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of contaminated materials after the rt-pcr assay.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling and processing of wastewater and effluent water samples","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral rna extraction and quantification procedures","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of rt-pcr for viral rna detection","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater and effluent water with pedv and mgv viruses","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective concentration method leading to inaccurate virus detection","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate safety measures during the concentration process leading to accidental exposure to viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 rna detected in untreated wastewater samples","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poliovirus detected during the global eradication programme","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in duration and magnitude of viral shedding in patients infected with sars-cov-2.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater, indicating potential environmental contamination and public health risks.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"}]}
